text.data-name: Purdy Rubin & Charlotte Figg, an NHS nurse and Horticulturist. They wanted to make cleaning products that they felt good using; both for themselves and the environment. What started as a hobby quickly became a movement of 100,000 customers who are demandin

and Horticulturist. They wanted to make
cleaning products that they felt good
using; both for themselves and the
